amendment.description: An amendment numbered 70 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to prohibit the use of any funds for transit-oriented development.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.
